description:
Experienced attorney Neal S. Johnson has served the residents of southwestern Virginia for over 30 years. Today, from our Roanoke law office, Johnson Law PLC, he continues to serve the people of the Roanoke metropolitan area who have legal needs in the areas of family law and personal injury law. Clients have turned to our law firm, and continue to turn to our law firm, for assistance with the following:

  • Divorce
  • Child custody and visitation
  • Child support
  • Property division
  • Spousal support
  • Adoptions
  • Same-sex family law
  • Fathers' rights
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Wrongful death
  • Medical malpractice
  • Product liability
  • Premises liability

Mr. Johnson began his legal career in 1981 after earning his Juris Doctor from Washington and Lee University School of Law and his admission to the Virginia State Bar. In the years that have passed since he began practicing law, he has earned a number of honors and awards for his legal abilities. To name only two of many, he is peer-review rated as AV-Preeminent* according to Martindale-Hubbell, and he holds a "Superb" Avvo rating.

If you were injured due to another person's negligence or if you face a family law challenge and you need an attorney upon whom you can depend, you can turn to our attorney at Johnson Law PLC. At our firm, we will work diligently to assist you as you pursue compensation for injuries or as you pursue your desired outcome in family court. To learn more about why Virginians have turned to lawyer Neal S. Johnson for more than three decades, you can take advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation.

*AV-Preeminent and BV-Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the Bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories & legal ability and general ethical standards.
